dublin_core.dcvalue: Telemedicine helps developing countries deliver medical services to underdeveloped rural areas where health resources are deficient Yet telemedicine diffusion in the largest developing country China remains a secret to the world This paper examines the evolution of telemedicine in China analyzes factors influencing the diffusion of telemedicine and provides recommendations to overcome obstacles to telemedicine
IEEE transactions on information technology in biomedicine : a publication of the IEEE Engineering in Medicine and Biology Society
Analysis of telemedicine diffusion: the case of China.
